website_summaries.verdict: An affordable kit that offers all of the essential tools and design elements to create beautiful nail art at home.
pros: Included tools have fun, colorful designs, perfect for pre-teens
Offers a wide range of rhinestones in different colors, shapes, sizes, and finishes
Comes with essential nail shaping tools as well as different sized dotting tools
Set sits at a low price point
cons: Multi-piece kit doesn't come with any storage containers or instructions

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain. You get a lot for the money, all of it works great, my favorites are the water transfer stickers. I haven't tried the rest of the decorations, but so far so good. Shipment came very fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for a Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece as one of her Christmas gifts but I'm not going to give it to her. The description had the words "set" and "kit" so I didn't think it would be just a bunch of individual packages shoved willy-nilly into a mailing envelope. I was really looking for something that looked like a set or kit in a nice box. The quality and assortment might be good, but don't plan on this looking like a nice boxed set. That won't matter, of course, if you're buying for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Glyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Endless amount of patterns, Brings out the creative side, DIY!
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviews have noted, this product contains 5 dotting tools. There is an endless amount of different options and patterns that can be created. I bought this product for my sister and nieces and they love decorating their nails. My nieces have just gotten to that age where she is learning what make up is, which makes this product all the better. Why go out to pay for a mani/pedi, when you can do it at home, all while spending quality time with family. This product also brings out an individuals creative/artsy side. Overall, great product, package comes with a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Alot of things!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a family member. Looked like alot of things for the price. Hope she liked it and gets good use out of all the things. The cuticle tool didn't come with the white tip though. I contacted the seller and they said it would be shipped. Not sure if it shipped or not since I gave them the family members address.......that reminds me. I should check on that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Nail accessory perfection
customer_reviews.text: I love this collection! It came with so many amazing pieces from nail lines, nail utensils, gems, nail stickers and more! I love how there’s such a bomb variety and came with so many things.
customer_reviews.author: XtineMBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Lots of embellishments
customer_reviews.text: This products comes with different round disk full of beads, faux pearls, faux diamonds and also patterns to be painted on your nails. It does come with a few different tools to make applying the embellishments better which I like! Also comes with a few nail files.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Stripes
customer_reviews.text: In general it’s all good, super fun stuff, but the stripes are all the same size and in the picture it seams that there where at least two different sizes, I know the colors where supposed to be random and I love what I got, just not sure if they where all supposed to be the same.
customer_reviews.author: isidora Rioseco

customer_reviews.title: Ok item
customer_reviews.text: Ok item the gold faded off the stones the next day kinda was pissed but they was still cute... but it was nice that it came with its carrying case...
customer_reviews.author: Missy Purple

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Dime I Spent
customer_reviews.text: It comes with so much. Ladies, order this if you want your money worth. All kind of goodiies, to fix your nails up
customer_reviews.author: Denise Trammell

customer_reviews.title: There are lots of things to use but not great or easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Its cool all the things that are there but some of the items are not good quality and others are not easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Maestre

customer_reviews.title: Nail Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has tons of items to decorate your own nails - great for young teenagers and adults. Dotting tool is a plus for anyone who loves to paint Medallions on canvas or etc.. My grand daughter will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda K. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! The only thing I found disappointing was, one of the striping tapes came right of the little spool. Otherwise, it is a great kit!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Imel

customer_reviews.title: Fun little nail decorations.
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and fun. I stuck in the metal decorations with clear nail polish. I can’t wait to try the decals on my toes tomorrow. Summer is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Stansbury-Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 16yr old daughter for Christmas, She's an inspiring Nail Technician and she says she absolutely love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Kids
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Just for fun. I do it to my 2yr olds nails 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Fharren

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money. The products are extremely cheap and are of terrible quality. spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: I use the prints all the time. The sequence aren’t conformed to fit your nails.
customer_reviews.author: Annette DeMaris

customer_reviews.title: Great nail decor!
customer_reviews.text: So much stuff for so little $$$. These stickers. I was skeptical at first, but they really work. So easy. See my picture about it.
customer_reviews.author: D Turner

customer_reviews.title: Neat decorations for nails
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but I'm excited to do my nails! Will update once I use!
customer_reviews.author: Raynisha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: Love these I use them all the time it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Felio

customer_reviews.title: Good gift/stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: My girls dug right into it and loved every item!!
customer_reviews.author: brittnany

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for some tools. Great price for quantity and everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: Janine A.

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the money!
customer_reviews.text: not packaged for gift giving but I just bought a make up bag and put it all in there for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value...there are so many pieces! Love the nail decals because they are very forgiving when placing them on the nail...even when they got folded in half I was able to unfold it and get it on my nail like I wanted. Endless design option possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Souza

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I ordered. I love it. Came faster then I thought it would. Will be ordering more. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Shirley McGhee

customer_reviews.title: Came out perfect in the package
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much I can’t wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Beronica Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It's a no for me
customer_reviews.text: It's overall, a good kit if you want rainbow colors, but the rhinestones are too small, and art tape has no silver, or white in the bundle
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of bang for your buck! Worth it for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Mickayla Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not satisfied with item not packaged for gifting and did not receive dotting pens
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love ! Came super fast and had everything handled nicely and nothing missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and worthit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter liked it a lot and very easy to use ..not only for teen girls but also for womens
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: The stickers to not stick to your nail and the stones are only OK.
customer_reviews.author: maria silvs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and I’m in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Chantae

customer_reviews.title: It was a very nice set for the money I love playing with it ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly. It was a very nice set for the money I love playing with it on my naild
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the purchase and will not be buying again
customer_reviews.text: FOr that price it should provide instruction book or something how to use it and what design to do and other things. I do not like the purchase and will not be buying again..
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new hobby! It will save me money in the future. I spend $35 on my nails each month. After I bought a nail polish set and this DIY set, I can do my nails at home and try different designs by myself! I love this set, especially the stikers and the dotting tools. Suggestion: If there are more small shinning stars in this set, it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: J.Y.

customer_reviews.title: So many fun pieces!
customer_reviews.text: This nail art kit was so exciting to open up! It made me feel like a little girl again, with its tiny flower stickers, metalic straps, and handy tools to use. It's quite a lot for the nice price. It will last a while and there's sure enough to share with other girls. Did someone say nail salon party?!
customer_reviews.author: Julia B

customer_reviews.title: It is fun!
customer_reviews.text: I found it fun and I feel inspired to do designs on my nails. The colors and designs I received are wonderful and good quality. I will use this often.
customer_reviews.author: Audra A. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cute set to start off with
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived right on time the only problem is that the containers for the rhinestones are so little and the nail stickers are actually nail tattoos. I’m a little disappointed about the small sized containers of rhinestones but excited to use the products.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: The variety in this package is great. The plastic containers of decorations could be a bit heavier to keep them from tipping over while being used.
customer_reviews.author: Little Old Lady

customer_reviews.title: Cut stuff
customer_reviews.text: Looks fun. My daughter can't wait to try them. She 16 and I would say for her age it is a nice starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these. The rhinestones are still on her toes over two weeks later. She loves them. I can't wait to try more designs for her and me. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KMurphy

customer_reviews.title: DIY nail art time
customer_reviews.text: Since Im a beginner it works but i was expected more rhinestones but for me to make at least 5 sets it worked out pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie3728

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. Comes with lots of gems, except some gems are very large and don’t stay on. Nail tapes and stickers are great.
customer_reviews.author: SMA Mommy x3

customer_reviews.title: Unusable tape strips and rhinestones did not come with glue
customer_reviews.text: The tape strips were not sticky and even when a top coat was applied over strips to hold down they would still fall off. But i do like the dotting tools and the stickers.
customer_reviews.author: kitty&baby

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot of items! And they're adorable!
customer_reviews.text: You get so much for so little! And it's all super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby&Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Okay overall for price. One of the containers of Rhinestones look Old and discolored
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: The gold beads lost their gold color in 3 days ...
customer_reviews.text: The gold beads lost their gold color in 3 days. None of the rhinestones fell off, I used Mia Secret strong clear nail glue with Aimeili gel top and base coat.
customer_reviews.author: PRISCILLA

customer_reviews.title: Good option for kids or at home manicures
customer_reviews.text: Not professional quality, but for the price you get a lot of product!
customer_reviews.author: mellieb

customer_reviews.title: very good product excellent shipping excellent product I would definitely recommend ...
customer_reviews.text: very good product excellent shipping excellent product I would definitely recommend this to anyone would love to try other products
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It is a very great deal for all the items
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves to do her nails, so I got this nail set for her. It is a very great deal for all the items. She is so excited to try everything on her nails.
customer_reviews.author: Coach R

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a value package, come lots of accessories, tools, stickers, glittters and etc. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: XJC

customer_reviews.title: Everything was good.
customer_reviews.text: Rhinestones are too small was expecting a little bigger stone. Everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: souda knights

product_meta.title: DIY Glitter Nail Rhinestones Decorations Dotting Tool Water Transfer Sticker Decal Nail Line Tape Striping Nails Sanding Buffing File Beauty Accessories Nail Art Set Kit (Style 2)
feature_bullets: This Nail Art Tools Kit included: 5pcs nail dotting tool, 5 wheels nail rhinestones, 6pcs nail sticker decal, 10pcs nail striping line, 1pcs nail file, 1pcs nail buffing block, 1 pcs nails sticker pusher

A selection of 5 wheels Nail Art Manicure Nail Rhinestones Decoration, 12 colors of nail-art rhinestones. 5 boxes rhinestones included round, multi-color, gold silver, clear,etc different color and pattern stones.Style: Metal, Acrylic, Pearl. Suitable to use on top of nail polish, uv gel, acrylic, decoration of cell phone case, greeting card, crafts, etc
Nail Sticker Decal: 6 style water transfer nail art stickers fit all fingernails and nail tips, makes your nail stunning

Manicure tools: 1pcs nail sanding files and 1 pcs buffing block, Essential nail art tools for filing nails before nail treatment / nail extension / manicure procedures. Can be used to file natural nails, false nails, nail extensions, etc.
Nail Dotting Tool: tool can be used for creating dots,decreasing size and to pull dots into different shapes, used on Natural nails,false nails,acrylic nails.
